sp_rel_widget_clone.payload: samplecpre { line-height: .5em; } form input { text-align: right; }sp_instancefalsecalcfalseCalculatortruetruesp_widgetfredex2014-10-22 15:46:34974a652347332100ba13a5554ee4908990Calculator7d051262e135330078502406b63333a9globalsp_widget_974a652347332100ba13a5554ee49089admin2017-08-24 19:00:38

sys_update_version.name: sp_rel_widget_clone_520b9d58db04c010e86f2a36ca9619da
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="Copy of Calculator">1e0b9d58db04c010e86f2a36ca9619d7</child><cloned>2019-09-18 12:14:41</cloned><last_validated>2019-09-18 12:14:41</last_validated><parent display_value="Calculator">974a652347332100ba13a5554ee49089</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category>sample</category><client_script><![CDATA[function() {	
	var c = this;	
	c.submit = function() {
		c.server.update();		
	}	
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>pre {
	line-height: .5em;
}

form input {
	text-align: right;
}</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>calc</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>Calculator</name><option_schema/><public>true</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[// data variable provided by caller
data.tape = [];
if (input) {
  data.tape = input.tape;
  data.answer = calc();
  data.tape.unshift({n0: input.n0, n1: input.n1, op: input.op, answer: data.answer});
	$sp.log("calc with input as follows... ");
	$sp.log(input);
	$sp.log("tape array...");
	$sp.log(data.tape);
} else {
	$sp.log("calc initializing ");
  data.n0 = 0;
  data.n1 = 0;
}

function calc() {
  var n0 = parseInt(input.n0);
  var n1 = parseInt(input.n1);
  if (input.op == '-')
    return n0 - n1;
  
  return n0 + n1;
}]]></script><servicenow>true</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>fredex</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-10-22 15:46:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>974a652347332100ba13a5554ee49089</sys_id><sys_mod_count>90</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculator</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Core" source="com.glide.service-portal">7d051262e135330078502406b63333a9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_974a652347332100ba13a5554ee49089</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-08-24 19:00:38</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div>
  <form ng-submit="$event.preventDefault()" class="form-horizontal well">
    <div class="form-group">
      <label>${Numbers please (no forgiveness)}</label><br/>
      <input value="0" ng-model="c.data.n0" type="number" /><br/>
      <input value="0" ng-model="c.data.n1" type="number" /><strong>&nbsp;{{c.data.op}}</strong><br/>
      <input value="0" ng-model="c.data.answer" type="number" readonly="true" />
    </div>
    <div class="form-group">
      <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" ng-click="data.op = '+'; c.submit();">+</button>
      <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" ng-click="data.op = '-'; c.submit();">-</button>
    </div>
  </form>
  <div class="well" ng-if="c.data.tape">
    <label>${Tale of the tape}</label><br/>
    <pre>
  <div ng-repeat="x in c.data.tape track by $index"><strong>{{x.answer}}</strong> = {{x.n0}} {{x.op}} {{x.n1}}</div>
  </pre>
  </div>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-09-18 12:14:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>520b9d58db04c010e86f2a36ca9619da</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>1e0b9d58db04c010e86f2a36ca9619d7</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Project2" source="x_393226_project2">bb4a5b6fdb737300e86f2a36ca9619b2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Project2">bb4a5b6fdb737300e86f2a36ca9619b2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_520b9d58db04c010e86f2a36ca9619da</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-18 12:14:41</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>
